svg.text: Quantum Memory States: Mystical Symbol Mapping Framework
Orthogonal Basis States Through Different Perceptual Lenses
Key Insight: Same Orthogonal Basis, Different Perceptual Lenses
• All information states exist within the same underlying orthogonal quantum basis system
• Differences arise from HOW we perceive, process, and measure the quantum information
• False/mis/dis/mal-information are NOT different realities, but different projections of the same basis states
